issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
HTML5 Video is not played on the first tap on play button needs a second tap to be played.

Not a Regression. Issue occurs in 3.1.3.GA also.

1)KS>BaseUI>Views>WebViews>HTML5 Video

Expected Result:
Clicking on play button and video must be played.

Actual Result:
Clicking on play button twice only video to be played.
fields.summary: iOS: HTML5 Video is not played on the first tap on play button needs a second tap to be played
fields.environment:
Tested Environment:

Appcelerator Studio: 3.2.0.201311221207
SDK:3.2.0.v20131125171956
alloy: 1.3.0-alpha6
acs: 1.0.8
npm: 1.3.2
titanium: 3.2.0-alpha3	
titanium-code-processor: 1.1.0-alpha
Xcode:5.0.2
OS: Mac OSX 10.9
Device: iphone5(V7.0.4),ipod Touch2(v7.0.4)

comments.body:
Issue still reproducible with test Environment:

Appc Studio:3.2.1.201401241158
Sdk:3.2.1.v20140124163734
alloy:1.3.1-beta4	
titanium:3.2.1-beta3
acs:1.0.12
titanium-code-processor:1.1.0
Osx: Maverick 10.9
Xcode:5.0.2
Device:Iphone5c(v7.0.4),Ipod Touch3(v6.1.3),iPad Air(v7.0.4)

But working fine on Ipad Air(v7.0.4)
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
